messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] single mom with 2 home businesses~ME TOO!
messages.msgSnippet: JULIE~ sometimes i feel the same way but I ALSO FEEL AS MUCH THE SAME WAY SA YOU DO About it has to be better ~~~~ the kids learn coping skills when we are
messages.messageBody:
JULIE~ sometimes i feel the same way but I ALSO FEEL AS MUCH THE SAME WAY SA
YOU DO About it has to be better ~~~~ the kids learn coping skills when we
are busy~ and they learn independence and thinking for themselves! AND HOW
About reading?? I have one son who reads to the others~ and we are filling
out all these wonderful forms for summertime reading and prizes from Movie
theatres, barnes and noble, tje local football team! WHATEVER WE CAN FIND>!
sometimes i feel like i "Taught" them nothing that day ~ but then wehn i sit
down to write in my log~ OH BOY did they do a lot! Really! just keep that
journal~ and go for it! love counts for an awful lot~ and from waht i ve read
just today on line~ SCHOOLS ARE WORSENING!!!!! DENISE


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
